name: Deep-Fried Peeps
description: Because Peeps don't taste so hot in their natural state, we tried deep frying them with fairly satisfying results. Here's our recipe.
recipeIngredient: 4 sheets Graham crackers crushed into crumbs

recipeInstructions.text: Dip Peep in egg whites, then roll in crumbs. Dip in egg whites again and roll in crumbs for a second coating. Dip in egg whites a third time and roll in shredded coconut. Pat coconut into the breading. Make sure the Peep is well coated so it ends up with an impenetrable graham cracker-shell armor.
Heat oil to 350°F and fry Peeps one at a time, rolling it over once one side has browned. Fry until the Peep is golden brown or starts to leak, about 30 seconds.
Place finished Peeps on paper towel-lined plate. Allow to cool a bit before eating, but eat it while the innards are still molten.
